api/Booseapp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | ASE Assignment Documentation
api/Booseapp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Represents a drawable canvas used in the Boose application. Provides methods to draw shapes, set pen properties, and manage drawing state. public class AppCanvas : Canvas, ICanvas Inheritance object Canvas AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members Canvas.background_colour Canvas.Rectangle(int, int, bool) Canvas.getBitmap() Canvas.Set(int, int) Canvas.WriteText(string) object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas() Initializes a new instance of the AppCanvas class. Creates a bitmap, initializes graphics, and sets default pen and background color. public AppCanvas() Properties PenColour Gets or sets the color of the pen used for drawing. public override object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Gets or sets the current X-coordinate of the pen. public override int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the current Y-coordinate of the pen. public override int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle centered at the current pen position. public override void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int The radius of the circle. filled bool Whether the circle should be filled. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown if graphics is not initialized or radius is invalid. Clear() Clears the canvas to the default background color. public override void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current cursor position to the specified coordinates. Updates the internal X and Y positions after drawing. public override void DrawTo(int toX, int toY) Parameters toX int The X coordinate to draw to. toY int The Y coordinate to draw to. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown if graphics is not initialized or coordinates are invalid. GetBitmap() Returns the current bitmap representing the canvas. public object GetBitmap() Returns object The current Bitmap object. MoveTo(int, int) Moves the pen to the specified coordinates without drawing. public override void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The new X-coordinate. y int The new Y-coordinate. Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle from the current position with specified dimensions. public override void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int The width of the rectangle. height int The height of the rectangle. filled bool Whether the rectangle should be filled. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown if graphics is not initialized or size is invalid. Reset() Resets the pen position to the origin (0, 0). public override void Reset() SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the pen color using RGB values. public override void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int Red component (0–255). green int Green component (0–255). blue int Blue component (0–255). Tri(int, int) Throws a NotImplementedException because triangle drawing is not required. public override void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int The base width of the triangle. height int The height of the triangle. WriteExceptionMessage(string) Writes an exception message onto the canvas in red text. public void WriteExceptionMessage(string message) Parameters message string The message to display.

api/Booseapp.AppCircle.html.title: Class AppCircle | ASE Assignment Documentation
api/Booseapp.AppCircle.html.summary: Class AppCircle Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Represents a command that draws a circle on the canvas. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandOneParameter and requires one parameter (radius). public class AppCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppCircle() Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class. public AppCircle() AppCircle(Canvas, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class with a specified canvas and radius. public AppCircle(Canvas c, int radius) Parameters c Canvas The canvas on which to draw the circle. radius int The radius of the circle. Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Checks that exactly one parameter is provided for the circle command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] The list of parameters passed to the command. Exceptions CommandException Thrown if the number of parameters is not exactly one. Execute() Executes the circle drawing command using the provided parameter. Draws an unfilled circle with the given radius on the associated canvas. public override void Execute()

api/Booseapp.AppCommandFactory.html.title: Class AppCommandFactory | ASE Assignment Documentation
api/Booseapp.AppCommandFactory.html.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Factory class responsible for creating instances of application-specific commands. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandFactory and overrides the MakeCommand(string) method to return corresponding command objects based on the command name. public class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MakeCommand(string) Creates and returns a command object based on the given command name. Supports "circle", "moveto", and "rect" commands specific to the application. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string name) Parameters name string The name of the command to create. Returns ICommand An instance of the corresponding BOOSE.ICommand implementation if recognized, otherwise defers creation to the base factory.

api/Booseapp.AppMoveto.html.title: Class AppMoveto | ASE Assignment Documentation
api/Booseapp.AppMoveto.html.summary: Class AppMoveto Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Represents a command that moves the pen to a specified position on the canvas. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters and requires two integer parameters (X and Y coordinates). public class AppMoveto : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppMoveto Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandTwoParameters.CheckParameters(string[]) CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppMoveto() Initializes a new instance of the AppMoveto class. public AppMoveto() Methods Execute() Executes the MoveTo command by moving the pen to the specified coordinates on the canvas. public override void Execute()

api/Booseapp.AppRect.html.summary: Class AppRect Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Represents a command that draws a rectangle on the canvas. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters and requires two integer parameters (width and height). public class AppRect : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppRect Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandTwoParameters.CheckParameters(string[]) CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppRect() Initializes a new instance of the AppRect class. public AppRect() Methods Execute() Executes the Rect command by drawing an unfilled rectangle on the canvas using the provided width and height parameters. public override void Execute()

api/Booseapp.CanvasException.html.title: Class CanvasException | ASE Assignment Documentation
api/Booseapp.CanvasException.html.summary: Class CanvasException Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Represents errors that occur during canvas operations such as drawing or rendering. Inherits from the base Exception class. public class CanvasException : Exception, ISerializable Inheritance object Exception CanvasException Implements ISerializable Inherited Members Exception.GetBaseException() Exception.GetType() Exception.ToString() Exception.Data Exception.HelpLink Exception.HResult Exception.InnerException Exception.Message Exception.Source Exception.StackTrace Exception.TargetSite Exception.SerializeObjectState object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors CanvasException() Initializes a new instance of the CanvasException class. public CanvasException() CanvasException(string) Initializes a new instance of the CanvasException class with a specified error message. public CanvasException(string message) Parameters message string The message that describes the error. CanvasException(string, Exception) Initializes a new instance of the CanvasException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that caused this exception. public CanvasException(string message, Exception inner) Parameters message string The message that describes the error. inner Exception The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

api/Booseapp.html.title: Namespace Booseapp | ASE Assignment Documentation
api/Booseapp.html.summary: Namespace Booseapp Classes AppCanvas Represents a drawable canvas used in the Boose application. Provides methods to draw shapes, set pen properties, and manage drawing state. AppCircle Represents a command that draws a circle on the canvas. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandOneParameter and requires one parameter (radius). AppCommandFactory Factory class responsible for creating instances of application-specific commands. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandFactory and overrides the MakeCommand(string) method to return corresponding command objects based on the command name. AppMoveto Represents a command that moves the pen to a specified position on the canvas. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters and requires two integer parameters (X and Y coordinates). AppRect Represents a command that draws a rectangle on the canvas. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters and requires two integer parameters (width and height). CanvasException Represents errors that occur during canvas operations such as drawing or rendering. Inherits from the base Exception class. Form1 Represents the main form of the Boose application. Handles initialization, user interactions, and drawing operations on the canvas.
